Using bundled data in bibliomatrix

Source: vignettes/public-data.Rmd
public-data.Rmd

The bibliomatrix package includes data from the KTH Annual Bibliometric Monitoring (ABM) public part, including KTH as a whole, its five schools and about 30 departments. The dataset, named abm_public_kth, is a list with three entries: meta, units and pubtype_order.

Unit info (meta)

library(bibliomatrix)
library(dplyr)

# To show the units included in the ABM, use either abm_public_kth$meta or the unit_info() function.
# (If no database connection is given to unit_info), abm_public_kth$meta is used anyway)
identical(unit_info(), abm_public_kth$meta)
#> [1] TRUE

unit_info()
#> # A tibble: 35 x 19
#>    Diva_org_id unit_code unit_short unit_long_en unit_long_sv parent_org_id
#>          <int> <chr>     <chr>      <chr>        <chr>                <int>
#>  1         177 KTH       KTH        KTH Royal I… Kungliga Te…            NA
#>  2        5850 A         ABE        School of A… Skolan för …           177
#>  3        5851 5851      <NA>       Architecture Arkitektur            5850
#>  4        5857 5857      <NA>       Civil and A… Byggvetensk…          5850
#>  5      875600 875600    <NA>       Philosophy … Filosofi oc…          5850
#>  6        5869 5869      <NA>       Real Estate… Fastigheter…          5850
#>  7       13604 13604     <NA>       Sustainable… Hållbar utv…          5850
#>  8        5884 5884      <NA>       Urban Plann… Samhällspla…          5850
#>  9      879223 E         EECS       School of E… Skolan för …           177
#> 10      882650 882650    <NA>       Computer Sc… Datavetensk…        879223
#> # … with 25 more rows, and 13 more variables: org_level <int>, active <int>,
#> #   description_en <chr>, kthid <chr>, slug <chr>, unit_long_en_indent1 <chr>,
#> #   unit_long_en_indent2 <chr>, altmetric_desc <chr>, altmetric_count <dbl>,
#> #   altmetric_href <chr>, altmetric_id <chr>, altmetric_level <chr>,
#> #   sort_order <int>

# The unit_code is used in most functions related to ABM
# For schools, unit_code is a single letter, for departments it is equal to the DiVA organization id
unit_info() %>% filter(unit_code == "I")
#> # A tibble: 1 x 19
#>   Diva_org_id unit_code unit_short unit_long_en unit_long_sv parent_org_id
#>         <int> <chr>     <chr>      <chr>        <chr>                <int>
#> 1        6023 I         ITM        School of I… Skolan för …           177
#> # … with 13 more variables: org_level <int>, active <int>,
#> #   description_en <chr>, kthid <chr>, slug <chr>, unit_long_en_indent1 <chr>,
#> #   unit_long_en_indent2 <chr>, altmetric_desc <chr>, altmetric_count <dbl>,
#> #   altmetric_href <chr>, altmetric_id <chr>, altmetric_level <chr>,
#> #   sort_order <int>
unit_info() %>% filter(unit_code == "5869")
#> # A tibble: 1 x 19
#>   Diva_org_id unit_code unit_short unit_long_en unit_long_sv parent_org_id
#>         <int> <chr>     <chr>      <chr>        <chr>                <int>
#> 1        5869 5869      <NA>       Real Estate… Fastigheter…          5850
#> # … with 13 more variables: org_level <int>, active <int>,
#> #   description_en <chr>, kthid <chr>, slug <chr>, unit_long_en_indent1 <chr>,
#> #   unit_long_en_indent2 <chr>, altmetric_desc <chr>, altmetric_count <dbl>,
#> #   altmetric_href <chr>, altmetric_id <chr>, altmetric_level <chr>,
#> #   sort_order <int>

# The org_level field is 0 for KTH, 1 for schools and 2 for departments. Info for all schools:
unit_info() %>% filter(org_level == 1)
#> # A tibble: 5 x 19
#>   Diva_org_id unit_code unit_short unit_long_en unit_long_sv parent_org_id
#>         <int> <chr>     <chr>      <chr>        <chr>                <int>
#> 1        5850 A         ABE        School of A… Skolan för …           177
#> 2      879223 E         EECS       School of E… Skolan för …           177
#> 3        6091 S         SCI        School of E… Skolan för …           177
#> 4      879224 C         CBH        School of E… Skolan för …           177
#> 5        6023 I         ITM        School of I… Skolan för …           177
#> # … with 13 more variables: org_level <int>, active <int>,
#> #   description_en <chr>, kthid <chr>, slug <chr>, unit_long_en_indent1 <chr>,
#> #   unit_long_en_indent2 <chr>, altmetric_desc <chr>, altmetric_count <dbl>,
#> #   altmetric_href <chr>, altmetric_id <chr>, altmetric_level <chr>,
#> #   sort_order <int>

# The parent_org_id field can be used to show all departments of some particular school
# (note that the parent id is always a Diva organization id).
unit_info() %>% filter(parent_org_id == 6023) %>% select(unit_code, unit_long_en) %>% arrange(unit_long_en)
#> # A tibble: 7 x 2
#>   unit_code unit_long_en                               
#>   <chr>     <chr>                                      
#> 1 6024      Energy Technology                          
#> 2 6030      Industrial Economics and Management (Dept.)
#> 3 879306    Learning                                   
#> 4 6038      Machine Design (Dept.)                     
#> 5 6048      Materials Science and Engineering          
#> 6 6061      Production Engineering                     
#> 7 880900    Sustainable production development

ABM tables (units)

library(bibliomatrix)
library(dplyr)

# The five tables presented in the ABM is available in abm_public_kth$units for each unit.

# Get public ABM results for KTH
kth_abm_tables <- abm_public_kth$units$KTH

# Show parts of table 1
knitr::kable(kth_abm_tables[[1]] %>% select(Publication_Type_DiVA, P_frac, WoS_coverage))
Publication_Type_DiVA P_frac WoS_coverage
Article, peer review 10393.32988 0.8835230
Article, other 721.43333 0.8281790
Conference paper, peer review 5442.42000 0.5841180
Conference paper, other 1515.36912 0.0284521
Book 106.09270 0.0047129
Anthology (editor) 50.15000 0.0066467
Chapter in book 913.05607 0.0355217
Article, book review 89.60000 0.5535714
Proceeding (editor) 34.81786 0.0287209
Report 563.12609 0.0000000
Doctorate thesis 1970.00000 0.0000000
Licentiate thesis 667.00000 0.0000000
Patent 15.00000 0.0000000 

# Get summary data for KTH
kth_abm_tables$summaries
#> $tot_pubs_frac
#> [1] 2891.883
#> 
#> $cf
#> [1] 1.116958
#> 
#> $top10_share
#> [1] 0.1091126
#> 
#> $jcf
#> [1] 1.258551
#> 
#> $top20_share
#> [1] 0.307572
#> 
#> $copub_nonuniv
#> [1] 0.1578518
#> 
#> $copub_internat
#> [1] 0.7198276

# Note that numeric unit codes need to be enclosed with ` 
abm_public_kth$units$`5851`$summaries
#> $tot_pubs_frac
#> [1] 29.00758
#> 
#> $cf
#> [1] 0.8033333
#> 
#> $top10_share
#> [1] 0.1293333
#> 
#> $jcf
#> [1] 0.7433974
#> 
#> $top20_share
#> [1] 0.1645299
#> 
#> $copub_nonuniv
#> [1] 0.07692308
#> 
#> $copub_internat
#> [1] 0.4615385

Order of publication types (pubtype_order)

library(bibliomatrix)

# The only current use for the pubtype_order part of the public data is to present
# the DiVA publication type numbers in a consistent manner
abm_public_kth$pubtype_order
#> # A tibble: 16 x 2
#>    pt_ordning diva_publication_type        
#>         <int> <chr>                        
#>  1          1 Article, peer review         
#>  2          2 Article, other               
#>  3          3 Conference paper, peer review
#>  4          4 Conference paper, other      
#>  5          5 Book                         
#>  6          6 Anthology (editor)           
#>  7          7 Chapter in book              
#>  8          8 Article, book review         
#>  9          9 Proceeding (editor)          
#> 10         10 Report                       
#> 11         11 Doctorate thesis             
#> 12         12 Licentiate thesis            
#> 13         13 Patent                       
#> 14         14 Popular science etc.         
#> 15         15 Other                        
#> 16         16 Not published material
